info.title: oembed-proxy
info.description: Convert any NDLA resource to an oEmbed embeddable resource.

get.summary: Returns oEmbed information for a given url.
get.description: Returns oEmbed information for a given url.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to retrieve embedding information for

parameters.name: maxwidth
parameters.description: The maximum width of the embedded resource

parameters.name: maxheight
parameters.description: The maximum height of the embedded resource

code.description: Code stating the type of error
Code stating the type of error

version.description: The oEmbed version number. This must be 1.0.

title.description: A text title, describing the resource.

description.description: A text description, describing the resource. Not standard.

authorName.description: The name of the author/owner of the resource.

authorUrl.description: A URL for the author/owner of the resource.

providerName.description: The name of the resource provider.

providerUrl.description: The url of the resource provider.

cacheAge.description: The suggested cache lifetime for this resource, in seconds. Consumers may choose to use this value or not.

thumbnailUrl.description: A URL to a thumbnail image representing the resource. The thumbnail must respect any maxwidth and maxheight parameters. If this parameter is present, thumbnail_width and thumbnail_height must also be present.

thumbnailWidth.description: The width of the optional thumbnail. If this parameter is present, thumbnail_url and thumbnail_height must also be present.

thumbnailHeight.description: The height of the optional thumbnail. If this parameter is present, thumbnail_url and thumbnail_width must also be present.

url.description: The source URL of the image. Consumers should be able to insert this URL into an element. Only HTTP and HTTPS URLs are valid. Required if type is photo.

width.description: The width in pixels. Required if type is photo/video/rich

height.description: The height in pixels. Required if type is photo/video/rich

html.description: The HTML required to embed a video player. The HTML should have no padding or margins. Consumers may wish to load the HTML in an off-domain iframe to avoid XSS vulnerabilities. Required if type is video/rich.

code.description: Code stating the type of error

ValidationMessage.title: ValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.description: A message describing a validation error on a specific field

field.description: The field the error occured in
